1.0.0.name: wordpress/easy-digital-downloads-csv-product-import
1.0.0.description:
This is an extension for Easy Digital Downloads that allows you to bulk import your products from a CSV file. The import can handle complete product creation, including descriptions, prices, categories, download files, and all other aspects of the download product configuration.

If you wish to report a bug or a feature request for this importer, please do so on Github.
